Fully lined swimsuit with a glitter print on the front and narrow shoulder straps.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with a wide frill trim at the top that continues over the shoulders. Matching bikini bottoms.
Patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top. Lined at the front. Bottoms with a frill and lined gusset.
Fully lined bikini with a lace pattern. Top with narrow shoulder straps and three layers of frills. Bottoms with a frill trim at the waist.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a modal blend with cap sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit.
Imitation leather wallet with six card slots, a zip at the top and a decorative tassel. Size 2x8x10.5 cm.
Rugby shirt in soft cotton jersey with a woven collar, button placket, appliqué on the front and short slits in the sides. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in a brocade weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, a very wide skirt and an underskirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.

Cold shoulder playsuit in a patterned viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist. Long, wide sleeves and short legs, both with wide lace trims.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with embroidery on the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with embroidery on the front and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a cotton weave with a wide elasticated flounce with broderie anglaise at the top, and an elasticated hem.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, adjustable straps and a zip in one side. Chest pocket, side pockets, a coin pocket, back pockets and slim legs.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps and fasteners at the top. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Dungarees in washed stretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps and fasteners at the top. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.

Top in superstretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and a flounce-trimmed V-neck with a narrow tie. Short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist with smocking at the back and a gentle flare to the hem.

Short lace dress with a V-neck and super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam and concealed zip at the waist, and a flared skirt with box pleats. Lined.

Shirt in an Oxford cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Checked shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a text print on the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, one with embroidered text, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft, patterned jersey with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
